title: Too Many Sweets
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 17 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 0L
description: In the story Too Many Sweets, a boy enjoys pie, cake, cookies, candy, and other sweet treats on Valentine's Day. As students read this story, they will have the opportunity to ask and answer questions, as well as determine the author's purpose. Detailed, supportive illustrations, the high-frequency word my, and repetitive phrases support early emergent readers.
meta: belly, brownie, cookie, cupcake, ice cream, pie
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /k/ sound
Capitalization : Capitalize the beginnings of sentences
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use the high-frequency word my
